name: Crash Course (Chazzri)
description:
ATTENTION!
An ASTEROID is heading straight to earth and you are our last hope to save humanity. The only enemy here is time. Deliver the explosive as fast as possible.

Made in Unity entirely in 3 hours
Art content is a mix of fresh content and things ripped from old projects
Unity project and code is all from scratch.

Controls
turn left         - a
turn right      - d
throttle          - space
restart            - esc
exit                   - alt+f4
